issue.title: [CF 1169] how to setup Touch of Karma absorb amount
issue.body:
hi guys,

its my first post here, so be gentle :P

I've looked on google, and other places, but couldnt find anything so far :(

Im been looking for a way to show the actual absorb bar/hp numbers for how much is left on my touch of karma BUFF, which I can put on enemy! ( not the one some other monk can put on me!!! )

A year ago ive used weakauras to set that up, but since that addon crashed alot, i just dont want to use it anymore.
But til today ive not found a way to show the actual amount, instead i got the duration, which is almost as good, but not the same :D

So i want the button as i have it right now, just with a number of the absorb amount on it :)

hopefully some1 can help me out :)

cheers

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.4.0

Exported String:

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SShowTimerText^B ^SName^STouch~`of~`Karma ^SEnabled^B ^t^N74003^S~`~| ^Sicon^^
